Control Statement: Manage beneﬁts and risks to make informed decisions when determining where to focus eﬀorts. For example, it may be beneﬁcial to deploy a workload with unresolved issues so that signiﬁcant new features can be made available to customers. It may be possible to mitigate associated risks, or it may become unacceptable to allow a risk to remain, in which case you will take action to address the risk.

control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you determine what your priorities are?
